VII.i.3.D.2.d
.
Effective Date of Payment of an Elected Benefit That Is Less Than the Prior Benefit
If VA receives an election of a
lesser
benefit from a child (orÂ the parent, guardian, or custodian, whichever applies) the effective date of payment of the lesser benefit is the date in the LAST PAID DATE field on the CURRENT AND HISTORICAL AWARD INFORMATION page in the Veterans Benefits Management System (VBMS).
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section D - Children With Two Veteran-Parents
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section D
